categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems military bases

nodes.text: This CIS Weapons Factory was located on the planet Diado, and was used during the Clone Wars. Its defenses comprised of B1-Series battle droids and Cold assault battle droids.
The factory produced variants on the Galactic Republic's AT-AT and AT-ST walkers, as well as a starfighter which was stolen by Jedi Master Saesee Tiin. During the theft, Tiin destroyed the facility.
